original_text: I will find the lost sheep and I will bring them back. I will cover their wounds. I will help those who are weak to become strong. But I will destroy those who are fat and powerful. I will give them justice as their food!
korean_text: 그 잃어버린 자를 내가 찾으며 쫓기는 자를 내가 돌아오게 하며 상한 자를 내가 싸매 주며 병든 자를 내가 강하게 하려니와 살진 자와 강한 자는 내가 없애고 정의대로 그것들을 먹이리라

sentences.original_text: I will find the lost sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 길 잃은 양을 찾을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and I will bring them back
I will help those who are weak
But I will destroy those who are fat
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나는 살찐 자들을 멸망시킬 것이다
